GCAM Regional Versions

Source: vignettes/regional.Rmd
regional.Rmd

Introduction

This page is a compilation of various GCAM versions that have some kind of regional breakout. Different institutions maintain these versions. We have divided them into 4 different sections.

  1. Core 32: The core 32 GCAM regions
  2. National: GCAM versions in which additional countries have been broken out or existing regions have been enhanced.
  3. Subregional: GCAM regions or countries which are broken into sub-national regions such as provinces or states

If you have built or want to build and maintain your own version of GCAM for a country or countries not yet represented in the core version of GCAM please post an issue on our github page and let us know so we can add you to the list below or help you out with any issues.

National Models

The table belows shows the versions of GCAM with new or enhanced regions along with the POC and institution at which it is hosted.

National Breakouts

name gcam_version new_regions POC Insitution Link
GCAM-KSA v6.0 Saudia Arabia Puneet Kamboj - puneet.kamboj@kapsarc.org KAPSARC https://github.com/KAPSARC/gcam-ksa
GCAM-Australia v6.0 Australia Yeliz Simsek - yeliz.simsek@anu.edu.au Australian National University None
GCAM-Chile v6.0 Chile Paelina DeStephano - paelina.destephano@pnnl.gov PNNL None
GCAM-LAC ? Uruguay Brinda Yarlagadda - brinday@umd.edu; Tom Wild - thomas.wild@pnnl.gov PNNL https://github.com/FeralFlows/GCAM-LAC/tree/6.0
GCAM-CCDR v5.4 Multiple (Azerbaijan, Paraguay, Angola, Burkina Faso, Chad, Mali, Madagascar, Mauritania, Ghana, Cambodia, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Republic of Congo, Guinea-Bissau, Liberia, Ivory Coast) Silvia Regina Santos Da Silva - ssantosd@gmu.edu George Mason University None

name gcam_version new_subregions POC Insitution Link
